function AddUsersToGroup(GROUPNAME) { try { // GLOBAL VARIABLES var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil(); var userString = workflow.info(data.get(3).data.username); userString = userString.replace('[', '').replace(']', '').replace(/\s/g, ''); var userArray = userString.split(','); var existentUser = []; var recordGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group'); recordGroup.addEncodedQuery("name=" + GROUPNAME); recordGroup.query(); // IF THERE IS MORE THAN ONE GROUP THROW ERROR var groupRecordCount = recordGroup.getRowCount(); if (groupRecordCount > 1) { throw ("Error there is more than one group with the same name. Please look into the group name"); } while (recordGroup.next()) { groupSysId = recordGroup.sys_id; } var recordUserGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); recordUserGroup.addEncodedQuery("group=" + groupSysId); recordUserGroup.query(); while (recordUserGroup.next()) { existentUser.push(recordUserGroup.user.user_name); } // MAIN for (x = 0; x < userArray.length; x++) { // LOOP FOR EACH USER WITHIN SPECIFIED GROUP NAME var recordUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); recordUser.addEncodedQuery("user_name=" + userArray[x]); recordUser.query(); if (arrayUtil.contains(existentUser, userArray[x])) {} else { while (recordUser.next()) { recordUserGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); recordUserGroup.initialize(); recordUserGroup.user = recordUser.sys_id; recordUserGroup.group.setDisplayValue(GROUPNAME); recordUserGroup.insert(); } } } } catch (error) { workflow.error("Error: " + error.name); } }c35ddef20a0a0ba96248a7090eccd518wf_activity1cfa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f81sys_variable_valuerwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:2390fa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f91rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:32// CREATED BY: ROBERT KELLER // DATE: 11/27/2017 /* DESCRIPTION: This script was created in order to create a dynamic user addition script to a specified group */ // GROUP NAME GOES HERE AddUsersToGroup('TEST IT ALL - RK'); function AddUsersToGroup(GROUPNAME) { try { // GLOBAL VARIABLES var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil(); var userString = workflow.info(data.get(3).data.username); userString = userString.replace('[', '').replace(']', '').replace(/\s/g, ''); var userArray = userString.split(','); var existentUser = []; var recordGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group'); recordGroup.addEncodedQuery("name=" + GROUPNAME); recordGroup.query(); // IF THERE IS MORE THAN ONE GROUP THROW ERROR var groupRecordCount = recordGroup.getRowCount(); if (groupRecordCount > 1) { throw ("Error there is more than one group with the same name. Please look into the group name"); } while (recordGroup.next()) { groupSysId = recordGroup.sys_id; } var recordUserGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); recordUserGroup.addEncodedQuery("group=" + groupSysId); recordUserGroup.query(); while (recordUserGroup.next()) { existentUser.push(recordUserGroup.user.user_name); } // MAIN for (x = 0; x < userArray.length; x++) { // LOOP FOR EACH USER WITHIN SPECIFIED GROUP NAME var recordUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); recordUser.addEncodedQuery("user_name=" + userArray[x]); recordUser.query(); if (arrayUtil.contains(existentUser, userArray[x])) {} else { while (recordUser.next()) { recordUserGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); recordUserGroup.initialize(); recordUserGroup.user = recordUser.sys_id; recordUserGroup.group.setDisplayValue(GROUPNAME); recordUserGroup.insert(); } } } } catch (error) { workflow.error("Error: " + error.name); } }c35ddef20a0a0ba96248a7090eccd5181cfa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f8truestandardfalsefalsefalsetrueAlways0falserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:231cfa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f90rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:23c7a5e32c0a0a0b3a002377c24ed8ea76false1falseBeginfalsefalserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:2398fa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f70rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:231970-01-01 00:00:00805cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b096202098fa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f7truestandardfalsefalsefalsetrueAlways0falserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:2354fa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f80rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:23c7a66f7d0a0a0b3a004544a6d2f14076false2falseEndfalsefalserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:23d0fa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0fa0rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:231970-01-01 00:00:00805cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b096526666a1a4b21113cbc340cb92b7a66144b0d3false3{"GroupName":"IT-All_Associate"}falseGet AD Group MembersfalsefalserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:2390fa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b09c0rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:231970-01-01 00:00:005cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b09611511190fa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b09cactivityOutput.data.username == nullbef3ed9c13f64700d80074c66144b0b8standardfalsefalsefalsefalseError-1falserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:239cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b09c0rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:2390fa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b09cactivityOutput.data.username != null6cd038d013764700d80074c66144b0e4standardfalsefalsefalsefalseSuccess-1falserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:23d0fa3a5113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0f70rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:23396807940a0a0b5c00afd9f67d9fd7a2false5{}falseMID Server FailurefalsefalserwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:235cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0990rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:231970-01-01 00:00:005cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b096300102wf_activity5cfa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b0991sys_variable_valuerwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:2394fa765113cfc340cb92b7a66144b09a0rwKeller2017-12-14 16:11:23Powershell script failed to retreieve any data. sys_update_xml.name: ecc_agent_script_file_683610cc133a0700d80074c66144b05c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_file"><ecc_agent_script_file action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><directory>false</directory><name>Get-ADMembers.ps1</name><parent display_value="PowerShell">ef89e4fc372001006b882d465abe5d60</parent><script>function GroupMemberLookup($GroupName) {
    $Output = @()

    try {
        Get-ADGroupMember -Identity $GroupName -Recursive -ErrorAction Stop | Select-Object -Property SamAccountName | ForEach-Object {
            $Output = "`"" + $_.SamAccountName + "`"" + $Output
        }
    } catch {
        $_
    }

    Write-Output -InputObject ("{`"name`":" + "[" + $Output.Replace('""','","') + "]" + "}")
}

GroupMemberLookup($GroupName.ToString())</script><source/><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_file</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rwKeller</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-27 20:44:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>683610cc133a0700d80074c66144b05c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get-ADMembers.ps1</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_file_683610cc133a0700d80074c66144b05c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rwKeller</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-12-14 15:31:54</sys_updated_on><version/></ecc_agent_script_file></record_update>
